name: Diagnosis Agent (A2A)
description: Provides the root cause of the home issue and ask for a DIY solution or suggest a professional.

skills.name: Diagnosis
skills.description: Diagnoses home issues, determines whether professional assistance is necessary, and, when appropriate, suggests DIY solutions with helpful guidance or video tutorials.

skills.name: DoYourSelf
skills.description: Given a home issue identify a suitable DIY solution. Search the web and provide a relevant YouTube video tutorial to guide the user through the repair.
